Reviews.Title: “Charged twice. Nightclub in basement meant no sleep until after 3am.”
Reviews.Author: Simonstravels
Reviews.Content: Arrived and owner claimed he had no reservation for me, showed him my booking on my iPhone. 20 minutes later he accepted there was a reservation. They charged my card twice for the room, and as yet have not responded to my emails. The main problem was the Indian Nightclub in the basement. We were on he seventh floor, and it was far too loud to sleep even with ear plugs in. If you don't believe me, try going there! The room was as cheap as possible. Everything was tatty, broken, or ugly. Shower was okay, but made whole bathroom slippery.

Reviews.Title: “Just Managed”
Reviews.Author: Suresh75
Reviews.Content: Was there last month and had to be there as a last minute decision. The bed was OK and slept well since I was staying in 6 th floor. At night the reception area was crowded with people visiting the bars etc.... Morning had to fight the leaking and broken toilet, small and cumbersome shower etc.... Breakfast was a relief, as it was simple and OK for the price you pay. First thing in the morning I did was pack and leave. The hotel parks your vehicle in the public parking behind the hotel. Go there, if you have no choice and on a very tight budget.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly pleasant”
Reviews.Author: A B
Reviews.Content: I stayed here between 20th and 23rd Feb 2012 and will try to make my review as unbiased and helpful as possible so here goes... I walked into Rush Inn expecting it to be a terrible Hotel based on the reviews I read on this website and had low expectations. I was greeted pleasantly by the staff and while I read some people had their passport kept with Reception for a long period of time, mine was scanned and returned immediately, so I was off to a good start. I was given a room on the 6th floor, which is the main reason why my stay here was pleasant. THE ROOM: My room was neat and tidy, had clean sheets and pillows. The Bathroom had the basics and was fairly clean. Yes, there was mould on the edges of the shower base, but the shower head worked fine and I could take a 15min bath in hot water. The balcony is probably home to pidgeons and it's not that clean, but let's face it, this isn't a 5 star resort you plan to spend the day enjoying. Like most people, you're probably here to spend the night. The sleep quality was quite good because the room was on the 6th floor. There are a few night clubs on the first floor and at night, from the 6th floor if you really strain your ears, you can hear the faint thud of bass, but honestly, it's not a problem on this floor. THE RESTAURANT: I only had Breakfast here and it was standard, which for me was good. It consisted of half Indian food and half continental. No problems here, I enjoyed it. THE LOCATION: Probably the best aspect of this hotel. 50m to the right is the metro. Opposite the hotel and across the main road are many shops, both for dining and electronics among others. If you take a right at the main road where the metro station is and follow the road, you will find fast food outlets. The hotel is about 30min away by train (with a change of lines) from Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa, so it's not exactly what I would call centrally located. OTHER: If you have booked a tour then you will have no problems, however, I noticed that Arabian Adventures doesn't pick up from this location, which suggests it's not one of the more commonly associated Hotels. However, next to reception is a tour booking desk which will be helpful. Wi-fi costs 15AED for 1hr or 50AED for 24hrs ***CONCLUSION*** I would only recommend this Hotel if you can get a room on the 5th floor of above. Any floor below and you will have a sleepless night! Remember, this is only a 3 star hotel and certainly nothing more. Also, 3 star hotels in Western Countries are slightly better if you are a fussy customer.

Reviews.Title: “So so Dirty worse hotel I have ever stayed in. It had a nest of baby pigeons on the balcony. With inches of their excrement on t”
Reviews.Author: BorntocruiseUK
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed in this hotel. Well stayed is perhaps the wrong word. I booked this hotel for some where to leave our cases before a 3am flight. We had been on a cruise. They add 20% taxes to the bill!! The room was tiny. The furniture was tatty and old. In one of the drawers was a hair left by someone else. The pillow had a stain and a hair on it. The bedding was dirty and I mean dirty. The shower was just a pipe and sprayed the whole bathroom including the shaver socket! It was so dirty with black mould on the ceiling. The mould extended in to the bedroom with numerous patches across the ceiling. The small dirty balcony housed a nest of baby pigeons on it!! When did you last see that. There is no safe. I don't know where the iron and ironing board was as advertised but it certainly wasn't in my tiny room. We eventually left for the airport early as we just couldn't stay any longer in this dirt pit. Our room was on floor 2 and the nightclub on floor 1 started playing load music at 8.45pm. It was so loud and I doubt anyone would be able to sleep through that. One good thing about the hotel is that is close to the Metro, and supermarkets.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sahira M
Reviews.Content: cheap and cheerful hotel - staff were very freindly and nice but if ur family orientated then dont visit the indian clubs, im from a western background but they shocked me! :) rooms were ok and plain - need new carpets and a bit of updating but ok for price - aprox 2 min walk from metro so amazing for looking around...

Reviews.Title: “Cheap hotel, resonably priced comparing offered service”
Reviews.Author: traveladicted1975
Reviews.Content: Hotel was not renovated for a while - and this can be easily seen (some electricity sockets are not working, water have problems to get into sink, spots on the carpet). Cleaning service kept room in good condition, beds linen and towels changed each day. Quite many Indian restaurants in the area with good food. Two disco clubs located in the hotel could be problematic (noisy) for lower floors. Almost no problem fo 4th floor I was sleeping. Staff insistenly tried to sell tourist attractions, otherwise polite and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “WASTE OF MONey !!! WORST PLACE IN UAE”
Reviews.Author: JAZ1408
Reviews.Content: F**** BAD attitude.. they dont know how to respect customers .. total waste of money... I paid for 1 room but didnt stay as guests are not allowed you need to prove each and everything about you as if you are going for somthing wrong. The moment you enter in the hotel they start thinking as if you arethere for somthing bad. At evening very noisy and bad smell.. PLEASE pay a bit more but stay at some nice place.

Reviews.Title: “Best Location & Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Mohanakrishnan
Reviews.Content: Cleanliness in room is ok . however, they have to improve complementary breakfast. no varieties . same menu on all days . since i stayed there for over 2 weeks , i could realise this. Better ask for rooms in upper floor. Two / three night clubs are there in Ist floor that make noice throught the night ( till early morning ) & disturbs the sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Entomologist Heaven”
Reviews.Author: traveller_dxb_10
Reviews.Content: As a keen entomologist you should have no trouble finding many large Supella longipalpa (Cockroach). Most days you should get at least three or four big specimens. It is also very important to always keep the bathroom fans running, otherwise they will run backwards and suck in pigeon feathers or worse from the vermin infested ventilation shafts. Often you can also enjoy a refreshing glass of the brown tap water, so keeping bottled water is highly recommended. The AC systems can also be an issue, fungal bronchitis is a very real possibility. Internet access is only available in the reception and cafe.

Reviews.Title: “Value for Budget”
Reviews.Author: rajeshm30
Reviews.Content: This one is situated right in BUR DUBAI where v can find lot of indian restuarants and lots of shopping for GOLD also.But i dont suggest this for families.As long as u go with friends this one is really a good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable for a budget hotel in Dubai City”
Reviews.Author: FamilyManKualaLumpur
Reviews.Content: My family checked in on 12thJan 2010 and checked out on 15th Jan 2010. The room was clean daily by the friendly staff. We booked through Easyclick and was immediately charged for the 3 nights stay in Rush Inn. The rate is acceptable and much cheaper compared if you walk in and check in on the spot.We personally contacted Rush Inn receptionist (Sherina) one month and also 3 days before the trip to ensure we got a place to stay in Dubai. We requested for a room higher from the mezzanine floor where the nightclub is located to avoid the noises. They requested us to give our passport for them to scan our details which we are quite reluctant to give in the first place. If they just write down the details from our passport than it should be okay for us. Besides that in general we do not have any complaints after making a comparative study of various hotels and the rate is acceptable though we expected a lower room rates. The location is strategically located between AlGhubaiba Bus Station and Khaleed Al Walid train station. We will definitely come back and recommend other people to stay in Rush Inn. - Mahmud Jaafar Kuala Lumpur Malaysia

Reviews.Title: “ok if u dont want to pay for a luxury hotel”
Reviews.Author: LondonE7
Reviews.Content: good location accesible by airport bus. walking distance to all the main places in old dubai. the noise from the niteclubs is too much and you have to insist on being moved to a higher floor. i dont know what goes on in those clubs but i went to take a look and was a bench full of what looked like 15 year old virgins and i have heard stories about brothels in some of these hotels so i did not stay around. does not seem family friendly and i only saw single males from the indian subcontinent. breakfast buffet was very greasy and not too healthy. the room was decent. ok to stay here if your not expecting much out of your hotel experience and want a clean decent place to stay for a low price

Reviews.Title: “Very handy for the bus stop.”
Reviews.Author: saltby
Reviews.Content: II stayed here for three nights and was lulled to sleep by the gentle throbbing of the sound system on the ground floor. Come equipped with ear plugs and all will be fine. Staff helpful and friendly. Room clean but I suspect I was sleeping between previously enjoyed sheets. Very handy for the bus stop. Wait for the x 23 and take a ride to International City. 30 minute trip. It`s only two dirhan - about 50 pence

Reviews.Title: “Yuk!”
Reviews.Author: xXxbumblebeexXx
Reviews.Content: We went to Dubai on a college trip, a group of about 20 of us stayed at the hotel, on check in they demanded to 'look after' our passports. Going up to the rooms as we were on a college trip boys and girls were to stay in separate rooms, the hotel had put us in rooms with mostly double beds in which meant we had to shre our beds, and refused to sort the problem. In one of the rooms cockroaches and ants were found in the fridge! Sparks came from the electric sockets when you used them, bathrrom was dirty, blankets and bed linen didn't smell at all fresh! Room service was okay, quick and nice food sent to your room, however breakfast provided was poor with chicken sausages, toast or rubber 2 hour old omlettes and other non breakfast type food to choose from. Nightclub was very loud every night until 2 to am in the morning. Hotel in general was in poor condition, dirty, smelly, old and delapadated. Old broken furniture and matresses were dotted around the corridors of the hotel. Apart from the hotel, Dubai was amazing!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Never more this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wheyman
Reviews.Content: A terrible hotel with a terrible service at a relatively high price. Ground floor hosts an extremely loud bar/disco which gives an impression of being a home for mafia etc. I stayed only one night in the room which I found quite dirty. Also staff was very unfriendly and unhelpful, also not too much customer-oriented. Definitely not worth this 300 or 400 Dhs per night.

Reviews.Title: “This is Not DUBAI”
Reviews.Author: Captain04
Reviews.Content: I just ben back from dubai , I have stay in the rush in hotel for 4 day , it was terrible. First of all there is no entrence for the hotel. there is a very bad smell that will not let you sleep. the room service was aufulle , they dont clean the room if you don't ask them for severall times. Also there is two night club that make a lot of noise in the hotel and you can't enter because it's only for indian. Finally if you site in the rush in you think your self in Pakisstan or India not in DUBAI!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Seriously!!!”
Reviews.Author: joeycdo
Reviews.Content: Engr.Jose Ray R. Deleste II, room 407, I stayed in this hotel from feb.29-march.6, cab from the airport will be around 30 dirhams, when i arrived in rush inn my first impression was bad, entrance was in front of a busy road, if you have a car, NEVER check in here cause they don't have any real parking for guests, my girlfriend had to park 5 blocks away, checking in took me an hour and thats not bad really but they must improve on it, front desk will not extend courtesy at all, good thing the bellhop was a filipino, he's name is JOJO and hes very helpful with my needs so i gave him a modest tip, my room was 407, it has a very big bed but a pathetic excuse for a toilet, you'll need to flush a couple of times for it to work, shower space was so small and although hot water was provided but the knob was stuck, restaurant food was a lot better than the accommodation but the price is way too expensive and the ambiance is none existent, by the way this hotel will not allow guests in your room at any given time, just an afterthought, to end i would like to tell you that, that was my first and LAST stay on RUSH INN hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Never recomend this hotel to decent people”
Reviews.Author: LastRaja
Reviews.Content: I was on business trip last month in Dubai and due to unavailability of a decent hotel booking; I was forced to stay at Rush Inn Hotel. The Hotel is located in very good area but it is well known for prostitution as it accommodate 2 night clubs and all night long I was unable to sleep due to the drum beat. So, I never recommend this hotel to a decent person.

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: 2yllek
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night. The room was very old and dirty with 'unusual' stains on the wall, pillows and bed. Furniture fittings were either broken or old, eg doors on cupboards did not close properly. Bathroom was ok, shower curtain was moldy and floor did not appear to have been cleaned. There is a nightclub next to the reception on the ground floor, noise seems to travel all the way up to our room on the 6th floor and lasted until 3.30am. We checked out the very next day to find alternative accommodation. This is definitely a budget hotel and suitable if you only need a bed to sleep in. Also a tip, taxis in Bur Dubai (the location of this hotel) are almost impossible to get during peak hours - we waited almost an hour.

Reviews.Title: “We can only recommend it”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were in Dubai from 17-24 April. The Rush Inn Hotel in Bur Dubai, which is located very central, was beyond our expectation. The only problem we had in the beginning was as we wanted to go to bed earlier than 3 a.m. The 4 in-house discotheks won't let you get asleep. Even if we lived in the 4th floor, one could hear the noise. But after two days we were accostomed to it, we were out every night until 2 - 3 a.m. anyways, so this didn't bother us anymore. The service crew is very friendly. The location can not be better. You can reach the small shops and the bazzar on both sides (Bur Dubai as well as Deira Dubai). We loved our stay in Dubai !! The Rush Inn Hotel is recommendable for young couples or bachelors. H & M FFM Germany

Reviews.Title: “dubai visit”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: we have just returned from staying at rush inn dubai we found the staff who were very helpfull and they made our stay very comfortable. noise from night clubs was a bit too much. rooms were comfortable for being a 2 star hotel. one thing which we found was not satisfactory was the shower. shower was too small and curtains were too short so water ran all the way in the bathroom. this made the floor sleepery and any one not carefull could slip and hurt themselves. otherwise no other complain

HotelInfo.Name: Rush Inn
HotelInfo.Address: Khalid Bin Waleed Rd | PO Box 44099, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
